title: Monstrous Maul
flavorText: No blade will harm me. No armor will stop me.

Bane.description: A model suffering Bane discards the highest result rolled anytime it makes an offense roll.

errata.description: A model suffering Bane discards the highest result rolled anytime it makes a defense roll. (Arcade: A monster suffering Bane Reduces its ARM by 1st.)
